message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_FV_TYPE_FIELD_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Home Visit Interview Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_FV_STARTDATETIME_FIELD_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Start Date and Time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_FV_ENDDATETIME_FIELD_MANDATORY
message.locale: An End Date and Time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_FV_METHOD_FIELD_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Home Visit Interview Method must be selected.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_FV_LOCATION_FIELD_MANDATORY
message.locale: A Home Visit Interview Location must be selected.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_FV_NARRATIVE_LONG
message.locale: Narrative must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_IF_HOME_STUDY_APPROVED
message.locale: The home study is 'Approved', a home visit cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_XRV_STARTDATETIME_ON_HOMESTUDYHOMEVISIT_DATE
message.locale: Start Date Time, %1z, must be on the related Home Visit Date %2d.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_XRV_ENDDATETIME_ON_HOMESTUDYHOMEVISIT_DATE
message.locale: End Date Time, %1z, must be on the related Home Visit Date %2d.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_XFV_STARTDATETIME_NOT_BEFORE_ENDDATETIME
message.locale: Start Date Time, %1z, must be before the End Date Time, %2z.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_XRV_INTERVIEW_MUST_HAVE_ATTENDEES
message.locale: An interview must have one or more attendees.

message.name: ERR_HOMEVISITINTERVIEW_XRV_INTERVIEW_MUST_HAVE_ATTENDEES_BEFORE_CREATION
message.locale: No attendees currently exist, add participant before adding an Interview.
